org.numenta.nupic.model

Class Pool

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.numenta.nupic.model.Pool

  • public class Pool
extends java.lang.Object
    Convenience container for "bound" Synapse values which can be dereferenced from both a Synapse and the Connections object. All Synapses will have a reference to a Pool to retrieve relevant values. In addition, that same pool can be referenced from the Connections object externally which will update the Synapse's internal reference.
    Author:
    David Ray
    See Also:
    Synapse, Connections
